title: Rest Countries App

title: E-Commerce App

title: Getir-Clone

title: Multi-Step Form
description: React Hooks like useState, useEffect; i learned them in  this project. Also i use Styled Components.

title: Netfilms App
description: This is my biggest and fullest application. I use NextJS in this project and i learned so many this about NextJS. I understand NextJS routing system in this project. By the way this is not my app, i re-create this app.
